short_summary: Psychologists are needed for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments.
description: The RCMP requesting the services of up to three Psychologists to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments. They are anticipating 20 hours of work per week per Psychologist.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Psychologists Services (Saskatchewan Region)**

**Reference Number:** M5000-24-0702/D

**Publication Date:** May 21, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, July 2, 2024 at 16:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 5

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of up to three psychologists for a duration of 20 hours per week. The purpose is to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments for fitness for duty, disability management, and performance-related issues, as well as conduct psychological screenings for RCMP applicants.

**Scope of Work:**

- Conduct clinical psychological assessments for RCMP members and applicants
- Provide debriefing services for critical incidents
- Develop and implement preventative health programs
- Collaborate with the F Division and T Division Health Services teams

**Evaluation Criteria:**

- A bid must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria
- Responsive bids will be evaluated based on price

**Tender Instructions:**

- Tenders must be submitted electronically to NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- Documents are available for download on Canada's tendering website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca

**Important Note:**

- The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
- Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime, which applies to all contracting activities
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Additional Information:**

- Canada encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender opportunity
- Visit the Indigenous Business Directory at www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory for more information and to examine eligibility criteria and register. 

**Contact Information:**

- Dino Cavalic
- dino.cavalic@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- (587) 335-6809

**Link to Tender Documents:**

- Tender Notice (en): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38570/202400702-d---en---amd-004.pdf
- Tender Notice (fr): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38570/202400702-d---rfp---fr---psychologists-v03.pdf
